func.title: SetHostility

param.name: player1
param.desc: Player whose hostility towards another player you want to change.

param.name: player2
param.desc: Player towards whom you want to change hostility.

param.name: hostile
param.desc: If true, the relationship is hostile. Otherwise friendly.

param.name: silent
param.desc: If not false, the hostility messages in the message board will be suppressed. Hostility messages are never displayed during the first frame of a round, regardless of the value of this parameter.

param.name: no_calls
param.desc: If not false, the callbacks RejectHostilityChange and OnHostilityChange are not executed.

func.desc: Sets bilateral friendship of two players.

example.text: Makes the first two players enemies without causing a message.
